SELECT T1.ARDY_BZEP_NO , ( SELECT ENTP_NM FROM IBIMS010B E WHERE E.ARDY_BZEP_NO = T1.ARDY_BZEP_NO ) AS ENTP_NM , T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN , T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_DT , T1.IB_CTRT_NM , T1.ISTT_CD , ( SELECT FNLT_NM FROM IBIMS992B B WHERE B.FNLT_CD = T1.ISTT_CD ) AS ISTT_NM , T1.ASST_MNGM_ACNO , T1.DPRT_CD , T1.RM_CTNS , T1.LQDZ_SCTY_ISU_YN , T1.HND_DETL_DTM , T1.HND_EMPNO FROM IBIMS900B T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.ARDY_BZEP_NO = #{ardyBzepNo} /* SPC */
AND T1.DPRT_CD = #{dprtCd} /* 관리부점 */
AND T1.IB_CTRT_NM LIKE '%' || #{ibCtrtNm} || '%' /* 계약명 */
AND T1.ASST_MNGM_ACNO = #{asstMngmAcno} /* 자산관리계좌 */
AND T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_DT > #{fromDate} /* 신청일자 PREV(수정해서사용) */
AND T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_DT < #{toDate} /* 신청일자 NEXT(수정해서사용) */

SELECT T1.ARDY_BZEP_NO , T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN , T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_DT , T1.IB_CTRT_NM , T1.ISTT_CD , T1.ASST_MNGM_ACNO , T1.DPRT_CD , T1.RM_CTNS , T1.LQDZ_SCTY_ISU_YN , T1.HND_DETL_DTM , T1.HND_EMPNO , T2.APVL_RQST_P_ENO /* 요청자사번 */ , T2.DECD_STEP_DCD /* 결재단계구분코드 */ , NVL(T2.DECD_STTS_DCD, '0') AS DECD_STTS_DCD /* 결재상태구분코드 */ , T2.RQST_DTM /* 신청일시 */ , T3.RNDR_IN_AMT /* 입금합계 */ , T3.RNDR_OUT_AMT /* 출금합계 */ , T3.TR_DT /* 거래일자 */ FROM IBIMS900B T1 LEFT JOIN IBIMS231B T2 ON T2.DEAL_NO = TO_CHAR(T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ARDY_BZEP_NO , FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN , SUM(CASE WHEN RNDR_DCD = '입금' THEN RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RNDR_IN_AMT /* 입금합계 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN RNDR_DCD = '출금' THEN RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RNDR_OUT_AMT /* 출금합계 */ , MAX(TR_DT) AS TR_DT /* 거래일자(임시) */ FROM IBIMS902B WHERE 1=1
AND ARDY_BZEP_NO = #{ardyBzepNo}
GROUP BY ARDY_BZEP_NO, FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN ) T3 ON T3.ARDY_BZEP_NO = T1.ARDY_BZEP_NO AND T3.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN = T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN WHERE 1=1
AND T1.ARDY_BZEP_NO = #{ardyBzepNo} /* SPC */
AND T1.DPRT_CD = #{dprtCd} /* 관리부점 */
AND T1.IB_CTRT_NM = #{ibCtrtNm} /* 계약명 */
AND T1.ASST_MNGM_ACNO = #{asstMngmAcno} /* 자산관리계좌 */
AND T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_DT > #{fincExcuRqsDt1} /* 신청일자 PREV(수정해서사용) */
AND T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_DT < #{fincExcuRqsDt2} /* 신청일자 NEXT(수정해서사용) */
AND NVL(T2.DECD_STTS_DCD, '0') = #{decdSttsDcd} /* 결재상태 */

SELECT T1.DECD_SQ , T1.DECD_STTS_DCD , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE 1=1 AND CMNS_CD_GRP = 'D006' AND CD_VL_ID = T1.DECD_STTS_DCD ) AS decdSttsNm , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE 1=1 AND EMPNO = T1.DCFC_ENO ) AS dcfcEnm , T1.DECD_DTM AS decdDtm , T1.RJCT_RSN_CNTN , #{fincExcuRqsSn} AS fincExcuRqsSn FROM IBIMS232B T1 WHERE 1=1 AND DECD_SN = ( SELECT DECD_SN FROM IBIMS231B WHERE 1=1 AND DEAL_NO = #{fincExcuRqsSn} AND PRDT_CD = ' ' AND DECD_JOB_DCD = '07' AND EXC_SEQ = 0 AND RQST_SQ = 0 AND TR_SEQ = 0 )

SELECT T1.TR_MM -- 거래년월 , T1.ARDY_BZEP_NO -- SPC코드 , T1.DPRT_CD -- 관리부서코드 , T1.DPRT_NM -- 관리부서명 , T1.SPC_NM -- SPC명 , T2.BFMM_RNDR_BLCE -- 전월말잔액 , T2.THMM_RNDR_BLCE -- 당월말잔액 , T1.DEP_AMT_TOT -- 입금합계 , T1.WDR_AMT_13 -- 신용평가수수료(출금) , T1.WDR_AMT_14 -- 대리금융수수료(출금) , T1.WDR_AMT_15 -- 설립청산수수료(출금) , T1.WDR_AMT_02 -- 확약수수료(출금) , T1.WDR_AMT_03 -- 자산관리수수료(출금) , T1.WDR_AMT_04 -- 인수수수료(출금) , T1.WDR_AMT_09 -- 주관/주선수수료(출금) , T1.WDR_AMT_16 -- 취급수수료(출금) , T1.WDR_AMT_99 -- 기타(출금) FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(A.TR_DT, 0, 6) AS TR_MM -- 거래년월 , A.DPRT_CD AS DPRT_CD -- 관리부서코드 , (SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'D010' AND CD_VL_ID = A.DPRT_CD) AS DPRT_NM -- 관리부서명 , A.ARDY_BZEP_NO AS ARDY_BZEP_NO-- SPC 코드 , ( SELECT ENTP_NM FROM IBIMS010B WHERE ARDY_BZEP_NO = A.ARDY_BZEP_NO) AS SPC_NM -- SPC명 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '1' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS DEP_AMT_TOT -- 입금합계 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '1' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '02' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS DEP_AMT_02 -- 유동화증권 인수대금(입금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '1' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '01' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS DEP_AMT_01 -- 기초자산 원리금(입금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '1' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '06' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS DEP_AMT_06 -- 취급수수료(입금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '1' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '03' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS DEP_AMT_03 -- 원천세 환급(입금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '1' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '04' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS DEP_AMT_04 -- 후순위대여 입금(입금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '1' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '05' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS DEP_AMT_05 -- 기초자산 매각대금(입금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '1' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '07' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS DEP_AMT_07 -- 자금운용 목적 계좌 회수(입금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '1' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '99' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS DEP_AMT_99 -- 기타(입금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_TOT -- 출금합계 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '01' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_01 -- 유동화증권 상환(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '08' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_08 -- 대출 실행/추가 인출(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '05' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_05 -- ABB/ABL 원리금(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '06' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_06 -- 원천세 납부(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '07' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_07 -- 후순위대여 상환(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '17' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_17 -- 자금운용 목적 계좌(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '10' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_10 -- 법무법인수수료(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '11' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_11 -- 업무위탁수수료(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '12' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_12 -- 회계감사수수료(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '13' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_13 -- 신용평가수수료(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '14' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_14 -- 대리금융수수료(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '15' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_15 -- 설립청산수수료(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '02' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_02 -- 확약수수료(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '03' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_03 -- 자산관리수수료(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '04' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_04 -- 인수수수료(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '09' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_09 -- 주관/주선수수료(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '16' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_16 -- 취급수수료(출금) , SUM(CASE WHEN A.RNDR_DCD = '2' AND A.ITEM_KND_CD = '99' THEN A.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS WDR_AMT_99 -- 기타(출금) FROM ( SELECT T1.ARDY_BZEP_NO , T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN , T2.TR_DT , T1.DPRT_CD , T2.RNDR_AMT , T2.RNDR_DCD , T3.DECD_STEP_DCD , T3.DECD_STTS_DCD , DECODE(T2.RNDR_DCD, '1', T2.SPC_DEP_ITEM_KND_CD, T2.SPC_WDR_ITEM_KND_CD) AS ITEM_KND_CD -- 1:입금, 2:출금 FROM IBIMS900B T1 , IBIMS902B T2 , IBIMS231B T3 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.ARDY_BZEP_NO = T2.ARDY_BZEP_NO AND T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN = T2.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN /* AND LPAD(T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN , 5, '0') = T3.DEAL_NO -- 현재 결재 구조가 결재시 PK정보를 가져가서 처리한다함(자금집행신청일련번호를 IBIMS231B 테이블 딜번호에 넣기로 함) */ AND T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN = T3.DEAL_NO AND T3.DECD_STTS_DCD = '2' -- 결재상태구분코드[0:요청전, 1:진행중, 2:결재완료, 3:반려, 4:요청취소] AND T3.SCRN_NO = 'TB07200S' -- 딜번호와 함께 입력 스크린넘버가 'TB07200S'로 입력됨 AND T2.TR_DT BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{fromMm}, 'YYYYMM'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{toMm}, 'YYYYMM')), 'YYYYMMDD') -- (조회조건)조회기간 ) A WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY SUBSTR(A.TR_DT, 0, 6) , A.DPRT_CD , A.ARDY_BZEP_NO ) T1 , ( WITH MONTH_RANGE AS ( SELECT ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{fromMm}, 'YYYYMM'), LEVEL - 1) AS MONTH_START FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(#{toMm}, 'YYYYMM'), TO_DATE(#{fromMm}, 'YYYYMM')) + 1 ), MONTH_BOUNDS AS ( SELECT MONTH_START AS MONTH_START , LAST_DAY(MONTH_START) AS MONTH_END , LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(MONTH_START, -1)) AS PREV_MONTH_END FROM MONTH_RANGE ), BLCE_INFO AS ( SELECT T2.TR_DT , T1.DPRT_CD , T2.ARDY_BZEP_NO -- , T2.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN -- 일련번호 추후 그룹핑해야할수도 있음 , CASE WHEN T2.RNDR_DCD = '1' THEN T2.RNDR_AMT WHEN T2.RNDR_DCD = '2' THEN -T2.RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END AS AMOUNT FROM IBIMS900B T1 , IBIMS902B T2 , IBIMS231B T3 WHERE T1.ARDY_BZEP_NO = T2.ARDY_BZEP_NO AND T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN = T2.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN AND T1.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN = T3.DEAL_NO AND T3.DECD_STTS_DCD = '2' AND T3.SCRN_NO = 'TB07200S' ) SELECT TO_CHAR(MB.MONTH_END, 'YYYYMM') AS TR_MM -- 기준월 , BLCE_INFO.DPRT_CD AS DPRT_CD -- 부서코드 , BLCE_INFO.ARDY_BZEP_NO AS ARDY_BZEP_NO -- 사업장번호 -- , BLCE_INFO.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN AS FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN -- 자금집행요청일련번호(일련번호 추후 그룹핑해야할수도 있음) , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN BLCE_INFO.TR_DT <= MB.PREV_MONTH_END THEN BLCE_INFO.AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) AS BFMM_RNDR_BLCE -- 전월말잔액 , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN BLCE_INFO.TR_DT <= MB.MONTH_END THEN BLCE_INFO.AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) AS THMM_RNDR_BLCE -- 당월말잔액 FROM MONTH_BOUNDS MB , BLCE_INFO WHERE BLCE_INFO.TR_DT(+) <= MB.MONTH_END GROUP BY TO_CHAR(MB.MONTH_END, 'YYYYMM') , MB.MONTH_END , BLCE_INFO.DPRT_CD , BLCE_INFO.ARDY_BZEP_NO -- , BLCE_INFO.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN'-- 일련번호 추후 그룹핑해야할수도 있음 ORDER BY MB.MONTH_END , BLCE_INFO.DPRT_CD , BLCE_INFO.ARDY_BZEP_NO ) T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.TR_MM = T2.TR_MM(+) AND T1.ARDY_BZEP_NO = T2.ARDY_BZEP_NO(+) AND T1.DPRT_CD = T2.DPRT_CD(+) AND T1.TR_MM BETWEEN #{fromMm} AND #{toMm}
AND T1.ARDY_BZEP_NO = #{ardyBzepNo} /* SPC */
AND T1.DPRT_CD = #{dprtCd} -- (조회조건)관리부점
ORDER BY T1.TR_MM , T1.DPRT_NM -- 관리부서명 , T1.SPC_NM -- SPC명
